# nav0

> A minimal, privacy-focused web browser. No data collection. No bloat. No AI gimmicks. Just clean, safe browsing.

nav0 is a free, open-source desktop web browser built on Electron and Chromium. It is designed for users who want a fast, lightweight browser that respects their privacy. nav0 collects zero telemetry, requires no accounts, and stores all data locally on the user's device.

## Key Facts

- **Type**: Desktop web browser application
- **Platforms**: Windows, macOS, Linux
- **Engine**: Chromium (via Electron)
- **License**: MIT (fully open source)
- **Price**: Free
- **Telemetry**: None. Zero data collection.
- **Source Code**: https://github.com/nav0-org/nav0-browser
- **Website**: https://nav0.org
- **Downloads**: https://github.com/nav0-org/nav0-browser/releases

## Core Principles

1. **Zero Data Collection**: nav0 does not collect, store, transmit, or process any user data. No telemetry, no analytics, no crash reports.
2. **Local-Only Storage**: Bookmarks, history, settings, and downloads stay on the user's device. No cloud sync. No account required.
3. **Minimal by Design**: Only essential browsing features. No AI assistants, no news feeds, no crypto wallets, no built-in VPNs, no shopping tools.
4. **Open Source Transparency**: Full source code is public and auditable. Users can build from source for maximum trust.
5. **Privacy as Default**: Privacy is not a toggle or a premium feature. It is the architecture. There are no privacy settings because there is nothing to configureâ€”no data leaves the browser.

## Features

### Privacy & Security
- Zero telemetry
- Tracker blocking
- Third-party cookie blocking
- HTTPS auto-upgrade
- Fingerprint protection
- Private browsing mode
- Referrer trimming
- Local-only blocklists for malicious sites
- Process sandboxing

### Browsing
- Tab management
- Local bookmarks with folders
- Bookmark import/export (HTML format)
- Local browsing history
- Download manager
- Configurable search engine
- Configurable start page
- Chrome DevTools for developers

### Performance
- Fast startup (no account checks, no sync, no feed loading)
- Low memory usage
- No background processes
- No idle network requests
- No pre-loading of suggested content

## What nav0 Does NOT Include (By Design)

- No AI assistant or chatbot
- No news feed or content recommendations
- No cloud sync service
- No cryptocurrency wallet or rewards
- No built-in VPN
- No forced account creation
- No telemetry or analytics
- No advertising-related features

## Comparison with Other Browsers

Unlike Chrome, Edge, Opera, and other mainstream browsers, nav0:
- Does not send browsing data to any server
- Does not require or encourage sign-in
- Does not include advertising or monetization features
- Does not bundle AI features
- Does not phone home for any reason
